author: Daniel Greene
description:
This week in Fantasy News: Hulu is officially shutting down, Disney goes to war with AI companies, and Brandon Sanderson reveals major Cosmere updates! Plus—Ridley Scott calls most movies “poo,” a Lord of the Rings AAA RPG may be in development, and we’ve got new book reveals from Peter F. Hamilton, A.S. Tamaki, and more.

Also featuring: a scratch-and-sniff romantasy, Dungeon Crawler Carl updates, Gunmetal Gods cover changes, and the return of Pumpkinhead!

⏰ Timestamps & Sources

00:00 I Am Quitting… Eventually – https://www.youtube.com/@2ToRamble

03:42 Ridley Scott Sure Likes Himself – https://variety.com/2025/film/global/ridley-scott-most-new-movies-shit-rewatches-his-own-1236540920/

06:24 Disney Scared AI Companies – https://theaiinsider.tech/2025/10/03/character-ai-removes-disney-characters-following-legal-action/

07:46 Hulu Go Bye – https://geekspin.co/disney-officially-shuts-down-hulu-after-20-years/

08:59 Gunmetal Gods Cover Switch
09:53 Scratch-and-Sniff Romantasy – http
title: I Am Quitting Fantasy News, Scratch and Sniff Romantasy, LOTR AAA Promise || FN
